name: StateOfSolitary
description:
Story:

A story about a kid returning back to the forest, but the memories of the past try to drive him to a different path.

Game:

A basic platformer for my first game, with a little twist if you are patient.

Controls:

Learn them on your own lameo (I luv yu though <3)

...Press "R" to restart the room

Bugs:

If you find a bug or anything that seems unbalanced please tell me

Please tell me your opinions, any at all, that's why I am uploading this after all.

Thank you for playing !
